project.name: Cuenca Alta. Piezometría Sequía 2018
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, ACUIFEROS.MASUB, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL FROM (ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN IPA1 ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO) INNER JOIN IPA1_UMBRAL ON IPA1.COD = IPA1_UMBRAL.COD WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL='DIA20111215' ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {}_{}_{}.png 3 1 2
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA;
project.select_umbrales: SELECT IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO, IPA1_UMBRAL.UMBRAL FROM IPA1_UMBRAL WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO='CNP ND' ORDER BY IPA1_UMBRAL.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO;
project.select_upper_relation: SELECT COD1,COD2 FROM IPA1_SELF WHERE COD1=? AND ACTIVO=1 ORDER BY COD2
